name: Tamari Chicken Lettuce Wraps
preparation: In Prep Bowl, whisk together seasoning, soy sauce, and water.
In Wok, heat oil over medium-high heat. Add chicken and seasoning mixture, using Ground Meat Separator to break up chunks; stir-fry until browned, about 4 min.
Meanwhile, dice zucchini and coarsely chop mushrooms. Add zucchini, mushrooms, and carrots to wok. Stir-fry 4 min, or until chicken has cooked through and veggies have softened.
To assemble, make eight stacks of two lettuce leaves. Top each stack with about 1⁄2 cup of chicken and veggie filling. Drizzle with toppings, if desired.
tips: For added crunch, swap zucchini for 1 can (8 oz/227 g) whole water chestnuts, drained and diced.

products.name: Chicken Fried Rice Seasoning (Pkg of 3)
summary: Plain white rice has its place at the table, but when it’s time to kick dinner up a notch, Chicken Fried Rice is the answer. Make a mountain of crispy fragrant rice – with notes of garlic, ginger, chives, and chillies – packed with protein and amplified by crunchy coleslaw.

products.name: Wok & Glass Lid
summary: Classic Wok with curvy side & generous surface area for stir-frying.

products.name: Ground Meat Separator
summary: Break up ground meat much easier & faster with this purpose-built tool.
